Topic.Title: An idea for a quest addition

Posts.HTML:
There's something I'd really like to see concerning menus. It would be nice if you could use a variable as a menu choice. Maybe something like:
addchoice <menu-name;choice-name;script-to-do>
This would be extremely useful to me.

Posts.EditableText: I thought you could set a variables as a menu choice just be setting the name to #something#? And you know what else would be great? Setting choices depending on conditional script.
